title: Episode #195: The Betting Man Returns
description:
• We discuss all the latest Wizarding World theme park news a bit more.
  • Listen to our MuggleMiniCast and read Eric’s reviews for more!
  • Andrew visited the Deathly Hallows set but can’t say much at all.
  • Emma Thompson is back for Deathly Hallows! How’d they convince her?
  • Deathly Hallows footage screened at ShoWest – why they showed it to them and not us (the fans).
  • Why on earth is Bloomsbury re-releasing the Potter books this soon?
  • Chapter by Chapter covers Chapters 13 – 15 of Prisoner of Azkaban.
  • Our first look at the love between Harry and Cho.
  • How could Draco and co. have been so stupid?
  • Why does Ron refuse to let go of his grudge against Hermione?
  • We analyze Sirius’ actions in this latest attack.
  • Snape starts to reveal some history between him and James – we bask in it.
  • Hermione’s anger towards Trelawney and vise versa – is it all justified?
  • Listeners write in with what they think our patronous’ would be.
  • MuggleMail address last episode’s hot topics.
  • Eric makes a new friends and tries to taking it to the next level.
  • Chicken Soup for the MuggleCast Soul.
  • We’ll be hosting a live podcast and more at Infinitus 2010.
  • Andrew talks about MuggleCast’s new regular release schedule.
  • This week’s episode of MuggleCast is sponsored by AudiblePodcast.com/MuggleCast!
itunes:author: Harry Potter
dc:creator: Harry Potter
